summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Big Barrier Super Set contains SIX full-sized hydrating heroes. This complete routine helps boost your skinâ€™s natural moisture barrier AND leaves dry and dehydrated faces feeling soft, dewy, and balanced.
details: DetailsBenefitsPromotes even, calm, and hydrated skinCleanses and soothes without stripping moistureLeaves dry skin feeling soft and balancedHelps boost and protect skinâ€™s moisture barrierBrightens and depuff under eyesIncludes a full Bubble routineFeatures a limited-edition Holiday lip balm flavor.Key IngredientsAllantoin (Soft Launch) helps soothe skinNiacinamide (Bounce Back) helps hydrate skin, calm irritation, and support skin barrier functionHyaluronic Acid (Water Slide) aids in holding water and binding it to the skinAvocado Oil (Slam Dunk) helps nourish dry skin, reduce redness, soften, and moisturizeGreen Tea Extract (Morning Rays) is a powerful antioxidant that helps calm and soothe skin, plus protect it from environmental stressorsMoringa Oil Esters (Tell All) give exceptional hydration and skin barrier recoveryIncludesTravel bagSoft Launch Hydrating Cream Cleanser (1.7 oz)Bounce Back Balancing Toner Mist (1.8 oz)Water Slide Hydration Boosting Serum (1.0 oz)Morning Rays Brightening Eye Cream (0.5 oz)Slam Dunk Hydrating Moisturizer (1.7 oz)Tell All Minty Lip Balm (0.15 oz)Item 2630501How To UseAM and PM, massage 2-3 of pumps Soft Launch onto wet skin. Rinse off and pat dry. Spray Bounce Back 3-5 inches from face for an instant skin reset. Apply 1-2 pumps of Water Slide to clean, dry skin after toner and before moisturizer. Apply to skin directly or add to your favorite moisturizer to boost hydration. Apply 1-2 pumps of Morning Rays to clean, dry skin, by gently tapping cream on under eyes. Evenly apply 1-2 pumps of Slam Dunk to clean, dry skin. Apply Tell All Minty Lip Balm evenly to lips as needed.IngredientsPlease see individual packaging for full list of ingredients.
how_to_use: AM and PM, massage 2-3 of pumps Soft Launch onto wet skin. Rinse off and pat dry. Spray Bounce Back 3-5 inches from face for an instant skin reset. Apply 1-2 pumps of Water Slide to clean, dry skin after toner and before moisturizer. Apply to skin directly or add to your favorite moisturizer to boost hydration. Apply 1-2 pumps of Morning Rays to clean, dry skin, by gently tapping cream on under eyes. Evenly apply 1-2 pumps of Slam Dunk to clean, dry skin. Apply Tell All Minty Lip Balm evenly to lips as needed.
ingredients: Please see individual packaging for full list of ingredients

media.headline: I would most definitely re purchase this product!

faceoff_positive.comments: If you're like me and love skincare that's gentle yet effective, you're going to adore Bubble's Big Barrier Super Set! From the moment I opened the case, I felt like I had stumbled upon a treasure trove of skincare goodies, all thoughtfully packaged in this cute, ready-to-go bag. It's not only convenient but also feels like a mini spa treatment in one kit. Inside, each product has its own unique charm. The Soft Launch Hydrating Cream Cleanser is the perfect start, leaving my skin feeling clean but never stripped. It's so refreshing to find a cleanser that's gentle enough for daily use! The Bounce Back Toner Mist has become my midday refresherâ€”it keeps my skin feeling balanced and hydrated, even after hours at the desk. I can't say enough about the Water Slide Hydration Serum! This gives my skin a gorgeous, dewy look that feels just right, especially now that it's getting colder out. And the Morning Rays Eye Cream? Total win for my morning routine. It's like a little wake-up call for my eyes, helping to brighten and reduce that dreaded puffiness. The Slam Dunk Moisturizer is exactly what it sounds like: a deeply hydrating boost that leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth without being heavy. And as a finishing touch, there's the limited edition minty lip balm. It's light, hydrating, and perfect for the season. Overall, this kit is a fantastic option for anyone who loves skincare or is looking to give a gift that brings genuine joy. Bubble really nailed it with this setâ€”it's quality, it's fun, and it feels luxurious without the high-end price. Highly recommend! #bubblegifted
faceoff_positive.headline: My New Skincare Go-To: The Bubble Big Barrier Super Set!

faceoff_negative.comments: I would recommend this really good bubble for your skin but it is very expensive
